english_example_sentence: If I cut the fresh red tomato carefully, the salad will taste delicious
russian_example_sentence: Если я нарежу свежий красный помидор осторожно, салат будет вкусным
turkish_example_sentence: Ben taze kırmızı domates dikkatle kesersem, salata lezzetli olacak
